name: A Pleasant Conversation
description:
Play as someone who get's convinced to go down town to the new place to pester some guys into maybe going on a date...

yup, in this game you can change your mind last minute..

Gameplay features -

  • Short dialogue segments 
  • Helpful Tutorials
  • Gameplay that I can only describe as 3 note guitar hero, without the rhythm

My First game jam entry and my first finished / released game.

______________________________________________________________

[Dev Note - There's a minor audio bug with the sound effects cutting out randomly during gameplay, ran out of time to puzzle it out.

 (it rarely happens but just a heads up). 

also if your spamming through the character dialogue super fast, it will break the sentence order until the next gameplay segment, don't go breaking anything more, haha.]

______________________________________________________________

Install Instructions -

download the game file suitable to your system, unzip the folder and run the exe file named (A Pleasant Conversation), the Linux version doesn't have a named exe file but I'm sure you got this handled.

______________________________________________________________

Made for the Yaoi Game Jam 2021
